Kraftlos, 

With so few players I have taken on more of a GM's role to keep=
 things moving, including taking on the roles of many of the toy or toon ba=
sed characters, but that can easily change as more people return. I had ins=
ulated your section until you returned, so that nothing would happen that y=
ou didn't want or expect. But that also means that your players are largely=
 in the dark :)

The easiest thing to do would be have your characters call=
 in for an update since I am sure they are as curious as you are. :)

From =
communication chatter your team would have heard and/or deduced that Tuscon=
 and some others went to recover Rodimus once and for all using some ruse t=
hat he and Nightshift had cooked up. Tuscon and others were eventually capt=
ured but then somehow got free, and at first appeared successful at recover=
ing Rodimus but soon after communications were lost with Tuscon and his tea=
m as he attempted to make his way back. 

He has since returned bringing ba=
ck a heavily damaged Rodimus and a Predacon. 

Sandy,

You are exactly righ=
t, I was wondering why nobody responded to my post. I can see where it was =
sent out, and all the tags on my side said that it was, but I see nothing o=
n the list. I guess now I see :)

I will resend. 

Thanks,
Preston
